posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rick McQuillan
SOLD, THANK YOU!
I am selling a bound edition of a full year of 1886 Youth's Companion magazine.  The magazines contain hundreds of woodcut ads, including ads for Reach Baseball Guides, Spaldings Athletic Rules, Peck and Snyder Baseball Badges, and Peck and Snyders Mail Order Catalogue.  The hardcover binding is in bad shape, with the front page competely loose.  The cover measures approximately 11 1/2 x 16.  

Paypal is preferred, but checks and money orders are fine.

$45 shipped.

[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g9/buymycards/lawsons001-1.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g9/buymycards/lawsons002-1.jpg[/IMG]

Rick, please see separate email.  Thanks, Lyman
